archimate:Goal.name: Manage deviations found in ISAE3402 Audit
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Solution proposal We need to bring the audit findings together and present them. If we have corrective actions that need to be taken we need to propose and scope the way forward - this may include - Quick wins - Longer term fixes - Considering zoning and segregation.
Solution needs to consider TCO as we don't want to be running audits in places we don't need to Needs to be realistic with the resources we have. This work is prioritized over the security baseline, although we could reuse some of it later...
